ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'ManagedPayment', ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(EBH_Stage__c), 'Onboarded'), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', AND($Profile.Name!='System Administrator',$User.Id!='0056A000000yx6iQAA'), RegistrationCountry__c!='Australia', NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please note changes to Stage beyond Seller Agreement can only be made by Payments BU
